trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies scope of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" /> as a page, document, or sequence of documents.
trans-unit.target: Wartość wyliczenia, która określa zakres <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" /> jako strony, dokumentu lub sekwencji dokumentów.

trans-unit.source: Based on the scope of defined by <c>printTicketLevel</c>, the number of pages or the number of documents associated with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.
trans-unit.target: Na podstawie zakresu z zdefiniowane przez <c>printTicketLevel</c>, numer strony lub liczbę dokumentów skojarzonych z <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs" /> class.
Gets or sets the default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia domyślne ustawienia drukarki, aby używać po wydrukowaniu dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: The default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: Domyślne ustawienia drukarki używane po wydrukowaniu dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Ustawienie <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> właściwości nie sprawdza, czy lub zmodyfikować określonego <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> dla konkretnej <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli to konieczne, użyj <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> metodę w celu utworzenia <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-określonych <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> która jest prawidłowa dla danego drukarki.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość, która określa zakres <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that indicates the scope of the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> event as for a sequence of documents, a single document, or a single page.
trans-unit.target: Wyliczenie wskazuje zakres <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired" /> zdarzeń, podobnie jak w przypadku sekwencji dokumentów, pojedynczego dokumentu lub pojedynczej strony.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> właściwość jest <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> właściwość określa liczbę dane wyjściowe dokumenty zawierające <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Dla innych <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> wartości, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> właściwość określa liczbę stron wychodzących z <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of documents or pages output with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera liczbę dokumentów lub stron danych wyjściowych z <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of documents or pages output with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.
trans-unit.target: Liczba stron dokumentów lub w danych wyjściowych z <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> właściwość jest <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel.FixedDocumentSequencePrintTicket>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> właściwość określa liczbę dane wyjściowe dokumenty zawierające <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Dla innych <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> wartości, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> właściwość określa liczbę stron wychodzących z <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
